response: I think we have to be very careful about protecting our personal information regarding data privacy in this era of digitalization and online world. People need to be aware of their rights regarding data privacy protection laws. They should be more cautious while sharing their personal information online, such as social media platforms or any other apps. Governments also need to take strict measures to protect the citizens' privacy by making it mandatory for companies that collect data to follow ethical and secure protocols for handling it.
